CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Cancel'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Complaint'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Done'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Follow Up'), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Status_Config__c, 'Redebet')
),1, 0 )
CustomField.label: Total Contact Collection Task ALI
